name: Edumancy - The Wizards of Wichita Falls
name_original: Edumancy - The Wizards of Wichita Falls
description:
Magical airships set the stage for your epic battle against your piling workload this semester thanks to your favorite university professors. Destroy assignments and exams to collect Life Savers, your guardians, who may just help you survive this semester.

CAN YOU COLLECT ALL 17 LIFE SAVERS ? -- CONTROLS --

Backspace - Reload Level

ON FOOT

W, A, S, D - on-foot movement

Space Bar - jump

HOLD Left Mouse Button to shoot

HOLD G - gravity enemy hold spell

Q/E - change camera angle

+/- - change camera zoom

HOLD F - interact (HOLD DOWN while on-foot moving to exit ship control)

SHIP CONTROL

Arrow Keys - ship movement

Space bar / LCtrl - elevation up/down

CREDIT

Sharome Burton (game design, programmer)

Logan Abreo (contributor, playtester)

Gabriel Bentley (playtester)
